projects.title: kaizen
projects.description:
Rebranded the company from iamadinkra which was more of a personal brand to kaizen av project, worked on designing the logo, and other brand assets including the brand manual, t-shirts, documents, and business cards, with extensive research aligning to the brands vision and appearance.

Worked on Redesigning and developing the new look for kaizen av projects, I created user flows to help visualize how users will interact with the website , designed all the pages on Figma with interesting UI an interactive prototyping, After I received approval from the client, I began the development for the website using the latest technologies add on features that will make kaizen av projects stand out from it competitors.
